title: 4th & Girl
description: 4th & Goal: A term used when the offensive team is on its final down and the goal line is the line to reach. 4th & Girl: A story where time is almost up, and the girl of his dreams is just barely out of reach.Leo Landry, first round draft pick and the New York Mavericks newest starting cornerback, uses grit, concentration, and sheer determination to make his difference on the field. But the mysterious girl of his dreams might be enough to break his cocky confidence. Will Leo prevail with a last minute 4th & Girl?
author: Max Monroe
